ai-patthana15.32:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.32:1.1_0: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities, or no cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.32:2.1_0: unskillful qualities don’t give rise to unskillful qualities. ...
ai-patthana15.32:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.32:3.1_0: When someone hasn’t declared these things, lacking no cause or condition. ...
ai-patthana15.32:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
